nodes.text: Star Wars Heroes and Villains Poster-A-Page
Star Wars Heroes and Villains Poster-A-Page was a book released under the Disney imprint by Time Inc. Books in 2015. It featured a selection of posters.

Bring heroes and villains from galaxies far, far away onto the walls of young fans with the Star Wars Heroes and Villains Poster-A-Page book! Featuring more than 100 full color images of the most iconic characters both good and bad in Star Wars Episodes I-VI, this book includes a poster on every page, plus 7 supersize fold-out posters inside.
